H0.text: Known as the Hero of Haarlem, what did the little Dutch boy use to plug the leak in a dike. Stick

H1.text: Known as the Hero of Haarlem, what did the little Dutch boy use to plug the leak in a dike. Rock

H2.text: Known as the Hero of Haarlem, what did the little Dutch boy use to plug the leak in a dike. Piece of cloth

H3.text: Known as the Hero of Haarlem, what did the little Dutch boy use to plug the leak in a dike. Finger
